node.data: {"welcome":"Welcome","seeDocument":"See document","email":"Email","phone":"Phone","address":"Address","postal":"Postal Code","country":"Country","status":"Status","approved":"Approved","pending":"Pending","role":"Role","joinedOn":"Joined On","approve":"Approve","approveTitle":"Users Pending Approval","approveMessage":"No users pending approval.","login":"Log in","logout":"Log out","signup":"Sign up","password":"Password","userInfo":{"adminPanel":"Admin","title":"User Information","loading":"Loading ...","question1":"Question 1:","question2":"Question 2:","question3":"Question 3:"},"submit":"Submit","menu":{"services":"Services","whoIam":"Who I am","contact":"Contact"},"cookieConsent":"This site uses cookies to enhance the user experience.","granted":"Accept","denied":"Decline","general":{"starts_from":"Starts from","get_started":"Get started","hide_details":"Hide details","show_details":"Show details"},"carousel":{"text_1":"Ceremonies | Symbolic Weddings","text_2":"Celebrate love in all its forms","text_3":"Honor union from unconditional love"},"services":{"re_programacion":{"title":"Support with PSYCH-K®","intro":"Reprogram Your Subconscious","icon":"reprogramming","copy":"Neuroscience studies have proven that 95% of our behaviors come from mental programs, that is, the subconscious mind. Therefore, it is much more effective to work from the subconscious to reprogram it with new beliefs such as: 'I feel safe,' 'I trust myself,' or 'money comes to me easily.' With this new information, it is much easier to achieve the results you want and live a stress-free life.","document":"reprogrammingPDF","modalImage":"reprogrammingModal","modalImageMobile":"reprogrammingModalMobile"},"sound_healing":{"title":"Sound Healing","intro":"Sound Therapy","icon":"sound","copy":"Sound therapy is an excellent resource to restore the balance of the physical body and harmonize emotional and mental states, as well as to connect with your inner self. It leads to states of clarity and deep peace. Regarding the nervous system, sound can complement the treatment of depression, anxiety, stress, insomnia, and more. By using specific frequencies, it is possible to modify brain waves to generate states of creativity, concentration, relaxation, or deep sleep.","modalImage":"soundModal","modalImageMobile":"soundModalMobile"},"ceremonias_holisticas":{"title":"Holistic Ceremonies","intro":"Circles of Light","icon":"ceremonies","copy":"Celebrate new cycles in your life with honor. These sacred spaces are designed to CONNECT and MANIFEST from the heart, creating moments of deep connection, surrounded by your loved ones, supporting and celebrating this special chapter of your life. Experience it either in a group or individually, as each occasion is unique.","modalImage":"ceremoniesModal","modalImageMobile":"ceremoniesModalMobile"},"aromaterapia":{"title":"Aromatherapy","intro":"Essential Oils","icon":"aromatherapy","copy":"The natural essences that protect plants from their environment and diseases can also be your source of well-being. Take advantage of these natural properties to improve your daily life.","modalImage":"aromatherapyModal","modalImageMobile":"aromatherapyModalMobile"}},"whoIam":{"title":"Hi! I’m Ana Briones","subTitle":"Welcome to this space full of light and personal growth!","copy_1":"From the heart of Mexico, I have been dedicated to personal development and the expansion of consciousness for over 16 years. This journey, full of self-discovery and reconnection with my inner power, has allowed me to work with various groups and discover my true passion: to serve. Now, my purpose is to share this experience with you and accompany you on your own journey of transformation and liberation.","copy_2":"It is an honor to accompany you on this journey, exploring together the infinite possibilities that await you. I invite you to start this path towards fulfillment."},"moreAboutMe":[{"title":"Qualifications That Support My Practice","details":[{"text":"I hold a degree in Organizational Psychology; I am a certified Personal and Organizational Coach from Tec de Monterrey and have trained as a PSYCH-K® Facilitator with Rita Funes and Martha Vargas.","index":1},{"text":"I have complemented my knowledge as a certified Sound Therapist from the International Institute of Sound Therapy with a specialization in Rapid Liberation Therapy, which has allowed me to offer practical and effective support with a holistic and integral vision.","index":2},{"text":"My experience extends to designing intentional spaces as a Holistic Ceremonies Facilitator, where I harmoniously weave all my previous knowledge to create experiences that nurture the body and soul.","index":3}]},{"title":"My Own Philosophy","details":[{"text":"The most important school for me is life experience itself; learning to unlearn every day because I firmly believe we can all access infinite possibilities to live a more harmonious life.","index":1},{"text":"From this awareness and humility of not having the absolute truth, I open myself to sharing and accompanying others in their life processes with the conviction that the power to heal resides in each Being.","index":2}]},{"title":"My Preferred Beliefs:","details":[{"text":"- My preferred beliefs:","index":1},{"text":"- I am my priority","index":2},{"text":"- The world is a safe place for my children","index":2},{"text":"- It’s okay to have more money than I need","index":2}]}]}
